metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7090 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
(A flaw was found in sudo in the handling of ipa_hostname, where ipa_ho...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-7090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5
sudo-ldap - 1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5').
